label: 攝關家
本: Medieval Japan:  Essays in Institutional History . Stanford University Press . 1974
著者: Hall, John W. and Mass, Jeffery P.
説明文: Sublineage of the northern branch of the Fujiwara house, which came to hold in heredity the posts of imperial regent" (sesshō) and "civil dictator" (kampaku). [藤原、摂政、関白] "
